raw_REAP <- read.csv('../data/JJ_JK_8_26_21_LC_MECFS.csv')
REAP.m <- raw_REAP %>% melt(variable.name = 'sample', value.name='REAP_score')

multi_class_viz <- function(index, feat){
  index <- as.character(index)
  shap_res <- read_csv(paste0('../results/shap_res_long_covid_', feat, '_class_index_',index, '_sqrt_normed.csv'))
  feat_import <- read_csv(paste0('../results/shap_feat_import_list_', feat, '_class_index_', index, '_sqrt_normed.csv'))
  
  shap <- shap_res %>% melt(variable.name = 'Feature', value.name = 'SHAP.value') 
  t25 <- feat_import %>% head(n=25) %>% .$feature %>% rev
  
  shap <- shap %>% group_by(Feature) %>% summarize(mean.shap =  mean(abs(SHAP.value))) %>% inner_join(shap)
  
  shap <- shap %>% arrange(mean.shap) 
  feat_levels <- unique(as.character(shap$Feature))

  shap <- shap %>% rename(sample = X1)
  
  shap_raw_merge <- shap %>% filter(Feature %in% t25) %>% 
  mutate(Feature = factor(Feature, levels=t25))
    
  shap_raw_merge = left_join(shap_raw_merge, raw.m, by=c('Feature'='Protein','sample'='sample'))


shap_raw_merge %>%
  mutate(Feature = factor(Feature, levels=t25)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = SHAP.value, y = Feature, color=sqrt_REAP_score)) + geom_jitter(shape=1) + scale_color_viridis() + ggtitle(paste0('SHAPley Plot of Viral RF for ', feat, '_class_index_', index))
  fp <- paste0('../figures/SHAPley_for_', feat, '_class_index_', index, '.pdf')
  
  ggsave(fp, width=10, height=10)
}

c(0:10)
for(x in c(0:10)){
  multi_class_viz(x, 'x0_LC_Symptom_dysaut_total')
}
multi_class_viz(1, 'x0_LC_Symptom_dysaut_total')

help(ggsave)
